casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos BENITEZ. No. 24PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Anne M. Gomez, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Benitez, Juan Carlos. Staples S. Hughes, Durham. Amy Kunstling Irene, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of June 2015 by Defendant to Take Judicial Notice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
